metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7401 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect interaction of the parse_packet() and parse_part_sign_sha256() functions in network.c in collectd 5.7.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) of a collectd instance (configured with "SecurityLevel None" and with empty "AuthFile" options) via a crafted UDP packet. It was discovered that collectd mishandles certain malformed network packets. A remote attacker could use this vulnerablity to cause a Denial of Service or consume system resources.

criterions.comment: collectd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.2-2ubuntu1').
